amendatorysection.catchline: Sickness and accident insurance; term insured; construction.
amendatorysection.para: The word insured, as used in sections 44-709 to 44-767, shall not be construed as preventing a person other than the insured with a proper insurable interest from making application for and owning a policy of sickness and accident insurance covering the insured or from being entitled under such a policy to any indemnities, benefits, and rights provided therein.
